name: layout
hint: Typescript: Layout SPAs contain multiple child SPAs and register in a route config

props.name: name
props.hint: Prefix with your teams name and use kebab-case, eg. wex-example-spa

props.name: cssScope
props.hint: Prefix with your teams name and a short version of the spa name eg. data-wex-es

props.name: channel
props.hint: A slack team alert channel eg. #wex-dev-alerts
